net.hudup.core.data

Class DatasetAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.data.DatasetAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.rmi.Remote, Dataset, DatasetRemote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Pointer, Scanner, Snapshot

    public abstract class DatasetAbstract
extends java.lang.Object
implements Dataset, DatasetRemote
    This abstract class implements partially Dataset interface. It add two variables such as config which is the configuration of dataset and exclusive indicating whether this dataset is exclusive. Note, if this dataset is in exclusive mode, it is clear (method clear() is called) when method Recommender#unsetup() is called (Recommender algorithm is stopped).
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isExclusive

        public boolean isExclusive()
        Description copied from interface: Dataset
        Checking whether or not this Dataset is exclusive. Dataset is often loaded and feed to the Recommender algorithm via method Recommender#setup(Dataset, Object...). If this Dataset is in exclusive mode, it is clear (method Dataset.clear() is called) when method Recommender#unsetup() is called (Recommender algorithm is stopped).
        Specified by:
        isExclusive in interface Dataset
        Returns:
        Whether or not this Dataset is exclusive

If this Dataset is in exclusive mode, it is clear (method Dataset.clear() is called) when method Recommender#unsetup() is called (Recommender algorithm is stopped).
        Specified by:

      • remoteSelectByContexts

        public Dataset remoteSelectByContexts(ContextList contexts)
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: DatasetRemote
        Creating remotely the sub Dataset (filtered Dataset) of this Dataset by selecting ratings whose contexts are in the specified context list. Context represents time, location, companion associated with a user when she/he is buying, studying, etc. Please see Context and ContextList for more details of context and context list.
        Specified by:
        remoteSelectByContexts in interface DatasetRemote
        Parameters:
        contexts - Specified context list
        Returns:
        Sub Dataset whose contexts are in the specified context list
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteIsExclusive

        public boolean remoteIsExclusive()
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: DatasetRemote
        Checking remotely whether or not this Dataset is exclusive. Dataset is often loaded and feed to the Recommender algorithm via method Recommender#setup(Dataset, Object...). If this Dataset is in exclusive mode, it is clear (method clear()} is called) when method Recommender#unsetup() is called (Recommender algorithm is stopped).
        Specified by:
        remoteIsExclusive in interface DatasetRemote
        Returns:
        Whether or not this Dataset is exclusive
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetCTSchema

        public ContextTemplateSchema remoteGetCTSchema()
                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: DatasetRemote
        Getting remotely schema of context template ContextTemplate. ContextTemplate is template for a context represented by the class Context. Context includes time, location, companion, etc. associated with a user when she/he is buying, studying, etc. For example, Time is the template for time context 31/10/2015 6:45. In other words, context is an instance of context template with specific value. A set of context templates is structured as the model which is called context template schema represented by interface ContextTemplateSchema. Please see Context, ContextTemplate and ContextTemplateSchema for more details of context, context template and context template schema.
        Specified by:
        remoteGetCTSchema in interface DatasetRemote
        Returns:
        ContextTemplateSchema
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        serverPort - server port.
        Returns:
        stub as remote dataset. Return null if exporting fails.
